import userEvent from '@testing-library/user-event'; import { setupMaster } from 'cluster'; import { stat } from 'fs'; import React, { useState } from 'react' import { CoursesNav } from '../Course/CourseNav/CoursesNav' import './MyProfileStyles.css' interface UserForm{ id: number, fname : string, dname : string, lname : string, tarea: string } type fnme = string; type dnme = string; // This type will be used later in the form. type User = { fname: fnme; dname: dnme; }; interface Props{ user: User } export const MyProfile = () => { const [user, setUser] = useState({fname:"", dname:""}); function handleSubmit(e:any) { e.preventDefault() // const {fname, dname } = e.target.elements console.log({username: user.fname, password: user.dname }) } let name, value; const handleInputs = (e:any) => { console.log(e); name = e.target.name; value = e.target.value; setUser({...user, [name]:value}); } return (
{/*
setState(e.target.value)}/>
*/}
{/*
*/} {/*


*/}
) } function useForm(): { register: any; handleSubmit: any; } { throw new Error('Function not implemented.'); }
